mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Virginia / by Jed. Hotchkiss, Top. Eng., Staunton, Va., 1874; The Geology by William B. Rogers, chiefly from the State Survey, 1835-41, with later observations in some parts ; lith. by A. Hoen & Co., Richmond, Va
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: A. Hoen & Co.
Hotchkiss, Jedediah, 1828-1899
Rogers, William Barton, 1804-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: R. F. Walker, Superintendent of Public Printing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes explanation of colors (showing colors of different geological periods).
From: Virginia; a geographical and political summary / compiled by Jedediah Hotchkiss, 1876, map between p. 46 and 47.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss B; copy 1: mounted on linen (Writing on back made illegible by mounting); copy 2: piece missing in Maryland section where folded
